Text: thanks dude. but i don't really see how comic books are enjoyable without the pictures :/

V for vendetta is the only one that is narrated by only one person, and it's okay. The rest have full vocal casting and sound effects. I got my wife hooked on these after 15mins. These are mature-themed stories and not for young children. All download fine and play great in itunes.
Thank you so very much! Please download more or steer me to where i can buy more.
